geneticAlogrithm

Class SequenceEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • geneticAlogrithm.SequenceEvaluator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.uncommons.watchmaker.framework.FitnessEvaluator<Sequence>

    public class SequenceEvaluator
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.uncommons.watchmaker.framework.FitnessEvaluator<Sequence>

    Class which define the Fitness function for your GA.
    you had to implement it to use the watchmer's GA API.
    Here we defined it for a Sequence object.
    For more details, look at the watchmaker API
    The principle is the following one:
    The Ga got an instance of type SequenceEvaluator and call to the fitness function.
    The fitness function lanch a praat script with the candidate and compare the formant's answer with the target's ones.
    To be sure that the fitness function wait for the answer of praat, the launch of the function put a mutex lock.
    This lock is releasw in the function getMessageFromPraat of the class GeneticAlgorithmCall when we are sure we get the answer

    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Pierre-Yves Hervo
    See Also:
    Sequence, GeneticAlgorithmCall

    • Field Detail

      • targetSequence

        private FormantSequence targetSequence
        The FormantSequence that is our target. We will use the values of this sequence as a comparison point with the values we get from praat to say if the candidate sound is good or not.

      • ga

        private GeneticAlgorithmCall ga
        The genetic algorithm. It is just a reference we need to get the messageFromPraat value.

    • Method Detail

      • getFitness

        public double getFitness(Sequence candidate,
                java.util.List<? extends Sequence> population)
        Method overWrited from watchMaker's API AbstractCrossover class. It define how the fitness score is calculated comparing the candidate and the target. It is used in the GACall. This function put a mutex lock on herself to be sure that the GA wait for the answer of praat before evaluating the next candidate.
        Specified by:
        getFitness in interface org.uncommons.watchmaker.framework.FitnessEvaluator<Sequence>
        Parameters:
        candidate - the first parent
        population - ?
        Since:
        0.1
        See Also:
        FitnessEvaluator

      • isNatural

        public boolean isNatural()
        Method overWrited from watchMaker's API AbstractCrossover class. It define if the fitness is natural or not. It means if we are looking for a bigger value than the previous one or a lower value. Here in our implementation, it is a bigger value. It is used in the GACall.
        Specified by:
        isNatural in interface org.uncommons.watchmaker.framework.FitnessEvaluator<Sequence>
        Since:
        0.1
        See Also:
        FitnessEvaluator
